participant_abstract.sent: As the industrial design responsible, I will be in charge of the technical aspects of the new remote control for television.
The remote control system should be original, trendy and easy-to-use.
Very first ideas have been proposed on the functionalities for our new product.

participant_actions.sent: Each individual is responsible to think about its own subject of expertise until the next meeting.

participant_decisions.sent: The main decision is that each individual involved in the project should gather information about its own subject of expertise on how to effectively build the new product.

participant_problems.sent: We mainly discussed about how to actually control the TV-set.
Since we want to develop a remote control capable of dealing with content, the main problem will be to gather information about the program content, and how to process it.
